law.full_text:
PURPOSE.
It is the purpose of this article to establish standards and approval procedures for the Transfer of Floor Area Rights in the Central City TFAR Area; to effect maximum coordination between the Community Redevelopment Agency and the City; to provide for the keeping of records of available Floor Area Rights within the Central City TFAR Area; to provide for an accounting of allocations of Public Benefit Payments and TFAR Transfer Payments derived from the Transfer of Floor Area Rights; and to facilitate those Transfers that generate Public Benefits.

unit.label: article
unit.name: Transfer Of Floor Area Rights – Central City Community Plan And City Center Redevelopment Project Areas

unit.catch_line: Approval Of Transfers - Authority And Procedures For Projects Involving Transfers Of 50,000 Square Feet Or Greater.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
PURPOSE. (§ 14.5.2)
PURPOSE. It is the purpose of this article to establish standards and approval procedures for the Transfer of Floor Area Rights in the Central City TFAR Area; to effect maximum coordination between the Community Redevelopment Agency and the City; to provide for the keeping of records of available Floor Area Rights within the Central City TFAR Area; to provide for an accounting of allocations of Public Benefit Payments and TFAR Transfer Payments derived from the Transfer of Floor Area Rights; and to facilitate those Transfers that generate Public Benefits.
